item.title: Friday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: Stocks resumed their losing ways on Thursday, as the 30-stock Dow slid 1,000 points and shed a chunk of Wednesday's big gains. What CNBC is watching F...

item.title: Trump's 'buy' call nets huge returns for those who listened
item.description: CNBC calculated how much well-known holdings rallied between when Trump posted and session highs.

item.title: These stocks are a good buy amid tariff uncertainty, according to investor
item.description: Investors still concerned about what will happen with tariffs have a place to hide in three stocks, according to investor Rebecca Walser.

item.title: Crypto-focused Janover skyrockets after completing its first Solana purchase
item.description: Earlier this week, Janover announced new leadership and introduced a treasury management strategy focused on acquiring Solana.

item.title: Retail investors are running head first into this topsy-turvy market
item.description: While the stock market whipsawed over recent days, average Joe traders saw an opportunity to buy the dip.
